text: @NYGovCuomo I keep seein that you're the reason why SO MANY #COVID19 deaths!🦠Happened in the nursing homes!BECAUSE THAT wod NOT be good!🆗️I also NEVER see your hair growing!👨🏻So if UR able to get your hair done?So should we be able to!It also would be nice?To see u wearin a mask!We do!
